description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares virtual methods for handling various OCI container events, such as start, stop, failure, and state change, each accepting a container name and a JSON object with data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface class for handling OCI container events with four pure virtual methods.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container starts. Takes the container name and event data as parameters.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container stops. Takes the container name and event data as parameters.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container encounters a failure. Takes the container name and event data as parameters.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Handles changes in OCI container state. Takes the container name and event data as parameters.
